post:
Hi there!
 
Thanks for checking out our offer thread today! We'll be answering any questions via this thread, private message or sales ticket. Let's not delay any further and get into the offers.
 
 **KVM2G**
 
       2GB DDR4 RAM   
       30GB of RAID10 pure SSD storage    
       1 CPU @ 3.5GHz (Fair share)   
       1 Dedicated IP address and /64 IPv6 subnet    
       1TB Bandwidth on 1Gbps port   
       20Gbps of DDoS protection     
       Located in Los Angeles, California
 [**ORDER HERE**](https://manage.gomach5.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=22&promocode=LETKVM7)
 
 VPS not for you? No problem - Check out out Dedicated offers below!
 
 **LET L5420 Special**
       
       Dual L5420 (8 Cores @ 2.5GHz)
       16 GB RAM    
       1x 500GB GB SATA 7200RPM
       /29 IPv4 with 20Gbps of filtering
       5 TB Bandwidth @ 1 Gbps    
       $30/month ($25.00 per month on semi-annual and annual terms)
 
 [**ORDER HERE**](https://manage.gomach5.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=5)

**BONUS:** We will add in an extra 500GB drive free on either quarterly, semi-annually and annual commitments - Just open a ticket after ordering and we'll make sure this is added.

 **LET E3v3 Special**
 
       E3-1270v3  (4 Cores, 8 Threads @ 3.5GHz)  
       32 GB RAM    
       1x 500GB GB SATA 7200RPM 
       /29 IPv4 with 20Gbps of filtering    
       10 TB Bandwidth @ 1 Gbps    
       $69/month ($57.50 per month on semi-annual and annual terms) 
 
 [**ORDER HERE**](https://manage.gomach5.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=27)

**BONUS:** We will add in an extra 500GB drive free on either quarterly, semi-annually and annual commitments - Just open a ticket after ordering and we'll make sure this is added.

Nothing here meet your needs or do you just want a different drive configuration? No problem. Send us a message and we'll be glad to work something out for you.

Our LookingGlass is [available here](http://la-lg.gomach5.com/)

 _Please note, if services are not paid for within 48 hours machines will be returned back to stock for others._

_Clients paying on an annual basis get 12 months for the price of 10. Clients paying Semi-annually get 6 months for the price of 5. Contact sales for more information on this._

_Incoming bandwidth is free on all dedicated servers._
